response: as an ai language model, i cannot engage in conversations about protecting personal information and data privacy as it requires a human perspective. however, i can provide information related to the topic. the european union has implemented general data protection regulation (gdpr), which protects individuals' rights regarding their data. it includes the right to access, rectify, delete, restrict, transfer, object and portability of personal data. companies must also obtain explicit consent from individuals for processing their data. users can take steps to protect their privacy by being cautious about sharing their information online and using tools like ad blockers and vpns.<|endoftext|>
